title: Communicative
body: Speaking lover and open minded guy always disposed to discover new points of view.

title: Creative
body: Best ideas came from those who throw caution to the wind.
Let's give a shot to what might happen.

title: Higly passionate
body: I do what I love and I love what I do.
Doing my very best every day to get results.

title: Teamwork
body: A happy and unified team will stop at nothing.
Feeling comfortable being part of a team.

title: Open-Mindedness
body: Sometimes is needed thinking outside the box.
Knowledge does not take up any space.
